mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM equipment
equipment_name LIKE '%'#{equipmentName}'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO equipment (equipment_name, equipment_last_inspect, equipment_inspect_cycle, equipment_status, equipment_content, createdate, updatedate) VALUES(#{equipmentName}, NOW(), #{equipmentInspectCycle}, #{equipmentStatus}, #{equipmentContent}, NOW(),NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE equipment SET equipment_last_inspect = NOW() WHERE equipment_no = #{equipmentNo}
mapper.select: SELECT equipment_no equipmentNo, equipment_name equipmentName, equipment_last_inspect equipmentLastInspect, DATE_ADD(equipment_last_inspect, INTERVAL equipment_inspect_cycle MONTH) nextinspect, equipment_status equipmentStatus, equipment_content equipmentContet FROM equipment WHERE equipment_no = #{equipmentNo}
